title: Chun Chun Chengzhang Ji Zhi Qingchunqi Pian
title_japanese: 春春成长记之青春期篇
synopsis: It mainly describes the various growth "troubles" encountered during the spring and spring period, closely combining with the current situation of society, and caring for the healthy growth of the spring teenager from both psychological and physical levels. To convey to the parents the concept of correct treatment of the problems of teenagers's growth, and to help Chun juvenile sort out the puzzles he faced in his growth. (translated from tenceng)
